rows.label: tev001791_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh! Hello there, [ST:playername ].
Are you on duty today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0002
rows.name:
I have the day off myself, so I was just tending
to my flower beds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0003
rows.name: Do you like flowers, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_JNK0010
rows.name: Affirm

rows.label: tev001791_SEL0011
rows.name: Express your fondness for flowers.

rows.label: tev001791_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: tev001791_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you've never really been a fan.

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0004
rows.name: I like them as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0005
rows.name:
I brought these seeds from Earth. I was so happy to
see them bloom all the way out here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0006
rows.name:
Seeing beautiful flowers always fills my heart with hope.
...Heh. It's always odd to say that, but it's true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0007
rows.name:
I think that if these flowers can thrive on this world,
then surely we humans can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0008
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0009
rows.name:
Sorry. I didn't intend to act so profound there.
I'll be very happy if my flowers bring you joy,
even if they don't have any deeper meaning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_JNK0030
rows.name: Praise Sincerely

rows.label: tev001791_SEL0031
rows.name: Wax poetic about the beauty of Hope's gerbera daisies.

rows.label: tev001791_JNK0040
rows.name: Praise Cunningly

rows.label: tev001791_SEL0041
rows.name:
Say that Hope was clever to grow "medicinal"
flowers, since they'll sell for a bundle.

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0050
rows.name:
You really do like flowers!
You even know their names.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0051
rows.name:
I imagine you'll be busy with your BLADE work for
a while, but when you have the time, would you like
to plant some flowers here yourself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0012
rows.name: I'd be excited to see which varieties you choose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0013
rows.name:
What? No! These flowers are totally harmless!
Plus, I'd NEVER use the church as a front for some
kind of illegal activity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0014
rows.name:
If I did that, they'd kick me out of BLADE.
Then they'd chase me out of New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0015
rows.name:
Must you always be working some shameless angle?
Ugh! Never mind. I'm done with this conversation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0016
rows.name: Is that right? Well, what about vegetables?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0017
rows.name: I love vegetables nearly as much as I love flowers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0018
rows.name:
Back on Earth, the congregants of my church were
always much more excited about the vegetables than
the flowers. They were a...practical people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0019
rows.name:
I loved watching them smile when they ate a meal
prepared with vegetables that we'd grown.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0020
rows.name:
When I saw something like that, it made me glad for
all the hard work I'd put into growing them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_JNK0060
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001791_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Hope what she cooked with the vegetables.

rows.label: tev001791_JNK0070
rows.name: Request

rows.label: tev001791_SEL0071
rows.name:
Express a desire for Hope to
grow vegetables for New LA.

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0021
rows.name: Stew![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0022
rows.name:
They raved about it in the local paper once,
so there was always a long line to try my stew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0023
rows.name:
It would bring in a lot of people I didn't get to see
otherwise, or those who tended to keep their distance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0024
rows.name: That's a very happy memory of mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0025
rows.name:
If we ever have the chance, I'd like to make my stew
again and have you try some.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0026
rows.name: Ah, Ornella has made the same request of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0027
rows.name: But everyone here has a job, and no one goes hungry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0028
rows.name:
So I decided that I could do more good by talking
with people than feeding them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001791_MSG0029
rows.name:
I'm sorry to disappoint. But while I don't have any
stew to share, you can have as many helpings of
conversation as you like. Come back any time.[ST:wait ]
